data.text:
RT @SACFC_Academy: 💥 School leavers don't miss out!

📚 Combine your A-Level or BTec education with our excellent football provision on this…
@ChilternA @verulamschool Thank you for visiting, lovely to meet your students and staff. Very impressed to see them actively getting involved with our Engaging Minds Lecture too 👏

Our last @Verulam6thForm Engaging Minds Lecture of the year #EML22 Thank you to Prison Group Director @ian_bickers for an insightful and thought provoking lecture. Advocating the 🇳🇴🇸🇪 rehabilitation model in face of (some) 🇬🇧 media demands for a retribution model? @verulamschool https://t.co/vHy0GUxogZ
Engaging Minds Lecture #EML22 this week saw the return of @verulamschool @Verulam6thForm 'old boy' Spencer Caminsky of @Shoutout_UK promoting Political Literacy in schools. https://t.co/cPues15Cek

Well done @StAlbansCath for hosting another annual Herts ‘Sixth Form Debate’. Engaging and divided perspectives on Free Speech in society/education/media from Maswood Ahmed @Fox_Claire @libdemdaisy @BimAfolami plus of course the Post-16 students 🗣️ https://t.co/hO5afyRcJ1
RT @verulamvoice: OVA Dinner #VerulamForLife 🦌 https://t.co/5bR6Ync1dq
RT @VerulamMaths: Congratulations to our @verulamschool @Verulam6thForm students for progressing to the next stage of the @UKMathsTrust #Se…

Engaging Minds Lecture #EML22 this week saw @verulamschool old boy, Professor @GoodwinMJ delivering a powerful and personal lecture to @Verulam6thForm reflecting on growing up in St Albans, his time at Verulam and how this has influenced his current work with @SMCommission https://t.co/90uQk1tHMY
RT @jrichardson_j: Excited to be @ChilternA this evening 😃 https://t.co/IRFGVF3DqL

Lovely to welcome back Jonny Watts, an @verulamschool old boy from Class of 2006 to give another @Verulam6thForm Engaging Minds Lecture #EML22 Sharing his journey from a Verulam to the ‘metaverse’ working in recruitment @Meta UK https://t.co/5JzhirOCV6 https://t.co/S2tqgWfDgW

Great to welcome the next gen of Y11 Scholar/Athletes into @Verulam6thForm today. In prep for the inaugural trials for our unique education programme with @SACFC_Academy combining three A-Levels / BTECs with top class football coaching. https://t.co/CHWwrCoh44

Thank you so much to @rachyoungeritv for an inspirational and insightful talk. A journey from a local state school to covering international events from Ukraine to Roe/Wade in USA for @itvnews Part of our Sixth Form ‘Engaging Minds Lecture’ series #EML22 https://t.co/X63zUQj9Y5… https://t.co/DxfpnKwD9R

A fascinating journey from Verulam in the 1980’s to Addenbroke’s Hospital Cambridge 2022. A big thank you to ‘old boy’ Dr Ronan O’Leary for sharing his work in polytrauma and Covid Wards. Part of our Sixth Form ‘Engaging Minds Lecture’ series #EML22 https://t.co/5JzhirOCV6 https://t.co/bR66T9ET0o
RT @VerulamMaths: Year 12 and 13 students @verulamschool are all set up and ready to sit the @UKMathsTrust #SeniorChallenge. I am sure all…

RT @stalbanscityfc: ⚠️ In year 11 this year?

📝 Our education programme is the perfect way to balance three A-Levels at @verulamschool with…

Every Friday our Sixth Form students benefit from a wide range of speakers from the world of politics, academia, business, law and order and charities as part of our ‘Engaging Minds Lecture’ #EML22 series. Autumn term programme details here https://t.co/5JzhirOCV6 https://t.co/fBAEF2Km4H

A very big thank you to Andrew Ridings and Elliot Sharpe of Page Executive Legal for delivering another excellent talk as part of our weekly Sixth Form ‘Engaging Minds Lecture’ series #EML22 https://t.co/T9NEnVrV5y

RT @ucas_online: 🚨 Need some motivation to start your personal statement? We've got you covered!💥 

Join us live on the Hub from 15:00 (UK)…

Fantastic start to our Sixth Form Engaging Minds Lectures of ‘22 #EML22 Thank you @MattHimsworth of B5 Consultancy. Sharing his journey from a state boys school, into law, into working with pro footballers, promoting positive online behaviour 💪 https://t.co/5JzhirOCV6 https://t.co/ie3wnlclYm
RT @verulamvoice: Our boys have done it! After smashing our target of £600 (raising over £1000), as promised, Christy, Faizan and Kamran ha…

urls.title: Shaving heads for Teenage Cancer Trust page
urls.description: Faizan Qutbi is fundraising for Teenage Cancer Trust. Donate on JustGiving

data.text: Before, during and after! 💇‍♂️ Three of our fantastic @verulamvoice @verulamschool Senior Team; Christy, Faizan and Kamran receive a ‘buzz cut’ from Mr Base raising over £1k @TeenageCancer Nice and ‘cool’ for the summer boys? https://t.co/6rPckxs4Rl https://t.co/FRbQKDCTh1

Very proud to join the Change Your Mind @QMGS_CYM network of hub schools. A full day training Y12s to deliver mental health and wellbeing sessions to local Y6s and @verulamschool Y7s #RoleModels https://t.co/7bttou4Kuh
@verulamGeogHoD Love that ❤️⚒

@verulamGeogHoD @verulamschool @MikeToley @Shaun_Perryman @stephenbase67 Nearly a decade of @Verulam6thForm Geographer’s have been inspired by your irrepressible enthusiasm. So fitting you sign off with another great trip 🌍☀️🌊  chapeau 🫡

Another night, another celebration. This time Senior Prize Giving for the @verulamschool Y13 Class of ‘21 👏 Twice postponed but lovely to now hear about their last 12 months at University, work or travels at last! https://t.co/5VHf1GVQdv

Congratulations to the Y13 Class of ‘22 for completing your exams. So lovely to see a full hall again with students, families and teachers for our Celebration Event. A fitting end to a 7 year @verulamschool journey, after the unprecedented last 2 years. Chapeau 👏 https://t.co/35vDjMMyMP
NYC22 @Verulam6thForm Social Sciences article on @WSTSchoolTravel blog. NYC23 launching soon 👍 https://t.co/bVIlTEJGDp

Sad but fond farewells to our lovely Y13s today. Unprecedented tough 2yrs. So many just popped in to say goodbye, along with all those still writing prep papers right up until P5. Roll on next week, you’re ready ✊ https://t.co/l3SxBoOaKB
@verulamschool @VerulamYear7 Perfect role models. Part of the impressive Senior Prefect Team 👏

He unleashes a strike from the edge of the of the penalty area which is lase…
@stalbanscityfc Go Huw, one of our own 💪⚽️👏
RT @verulamstemclub: Amazing opportunity for any 6th form students looking to pursue a career in #STEM @Verulam6thForm

Thank you so much to @hcpearson for delivering such an ‘Engaging’ Lecture for our @verulamschool Y12 ‘Minds’, a 3-in-1 Ted Talk! Science Career, Science Journalism / Author @nature & Covid! https://t.co/UJNk95iWrr

Y12/Y13 Embrace the Yellow Tomorrow 🟡😎 Friday 8th October is World Mental Health Day, and to mark this event, we are encouraging everyone to accessorise with yellow. #HelloYellow is a national initiative aimed at raising funds for the charity @YoungMindsUK https://t.co/L5ICMysMGr

urls.title: Player Education Programme - BTEC Level 3 Diploma
urls.description: The St Albans City Football Club education programme provides aspiring young footballers with the perfect opportunity to combine their academic studies with first-class football training

tweets.text:
💥 School leavers don't miss out!

📚 Combine your A-Level or BTec education with our excellent football provision on this unique programme in partnership with @Verulamschool 

🗓️ Trials just 2 weeks away!
📋 For more info or to register:
👉 https://t.co/q3NtWrjg7c

#SACFC 😇 https://t.co/HjDp4gqXka
Year 11 pupils enjoyed visiting @verulamschool today to see the 6th form in action! https://t.co/wBbVRb5WDF
OVA Dinner #VerulamForLife 🦌 https://t.co/5bR6Ync1dq

Congratulations to our @verulamschool @Verulam6thForm students for progressing to the next stage of the @UKMathsTrust #SeniorChallenge. 👏👏. Good luck today 🤞We are sure all your hard work will pay off.
Excited to be @ChilternA this evening 😃 https://t.co/IRFGVF3DqL
Year 12 and 13 students @verulamschool are all set up and ready to sit the @UKMathsTrust #SeniorChallenge. I am sure all your hard work will pay off! 👏👏@Verulam6thForm

⚠️ In year 11 this year?

📝 Our education programme is the perfect way to balance three A-Levels at @verulamschool with top class football coaching.

📆 To get involved, attend one of our trials on the 28th October or 23rd December

#SACFC 😇 https://t.co/Rd1kv2liBf

🚨 Need some motivation to start your personal statement? We've got you covered!💥 

Join us live on the Hub from 15:00 (UK) tomorrow for our write-along workshop with the experts 🧠 👉 https://t.co/O6mVSMHPwb https://t.co/gSKi4wfvNY

Our boys have done it! After smashing our target of £600 (raising over £1000), as promised, Christy, Faizan and Kamran have all shaved their heads in support of Teenage Cancer Trust and the Ollie Mills Foundation. 

A very proud school captain. https://t.co/MVn9NTAxAI

The quality of the workshops being prepared by @Verulam6thForm are excellent - I am really looking forward to seeing the finished products later! They are preparing our Transition to Secondary School and Relationships workshops. https://t.co/qztoWYS4M3
An excellent day spent with @QMGS_CYM learning all about the importance and different aspects of mental health. Nothing but hands on enjoyment for the @Verulam6thForm https://t.co/Fy3CtFESpd

Absolute touching gift from members of #VGL62022 @Verulam6thForm. Closure of my time marked by the 22 on my back! THANK YOU. I want #AGIA for you all. #proudteacher #honouredteacher #thankfulteacher https://t.co/4T9WLkitWX

Special picture with my final ever #VGL6 #VGU6 #VG6thform @Verulam6thForm. First field trip was to Walton-on-the-Naze @verulamschool. Great to bookend the moments with fabulous students and colleagues. @MikeToley @Shaun_Perryman @stephenbase67! #WDJTGWCG #AGIA https://t.co/HzdUclzNcW

Further day one action at #VGWOTN22 from #VG6thform with measuring groyne sand heights, Long Shore Drift and wave frequency. #NEA data looking good. #AGIA! Being @Verulam6thForm is great but getting outdoors is better! https://t.co/sAUNTPHFCr

Our primary school assembly tour continued this morning as our Senior prefects visited St. Alban & St. Stephen Catholic Primary School. Harrison, James and Sam spoke amazingly and answered a host of questions from the students 👏🏻💙

#verulamforlife https://t.co/o4UtCaj6wk

Special guest speaker for @Verulam6thForm Y12 Sociologists today @redrumlisa generous with her time discussing her new book. Inspiring, open, honest and real. Covering her Ethnographic research methods, her path into academia & the importance of working class voices in Sociology https://t.co/3YoMz77ade

So proud of our year 12 @verulamschool mathematicians  mentoring some of our KS3 students in our library. A perfect environment to get to know each other and to enjoy studying maths @Verulam6thForm @Verulearning #VerulamForLife https://t.co/qjNrkAlMa7

An amazing assembly this morning at @FleetvilleJnr @FleetvilleSport hosted by our senior prefects based all around secondary transition👏🏻👏🏻

A massive well done to Myles, Harris & Alex who spoke magnificently and gave Fleetville KS2 some great advice!

#verulamforlife https://t.co/kQXFOKunTJ

tweets.text:
⚽ Education Player Programme Trial

📅 Wednesday 1st June
⏱️ 5 - 6:30
📍 Verulam School

ℹ️ https://t.co/gB7fNVSUTb
#SACFCAcademy😇 https://t.co/nWIcCcOpS2
Great meeting next year’s Year7 pupils and families and great speeches by our boys this evening @verulamschool @VerulamYear7 @Verulam6thForm 😊👏 #VerulamForLife https://t.co/BsYhFTb6wX

@verulamschool has booked our final in-house training day of this academic year, on 15th July! If you are interested in booking training for your pupils in 2022-23, please email changeyourmind@qmgs.walsall.sch.uk to be added to the mailing list so you can be the first to hear.

Year 11 are crowed County Champions!!!! 3-0 victory against Richard Hale 🏆🏆💙

A superb performance that see’s the Vs go through the entire completion without conceding a goal⚽️

Goals from:
Oliver M
Bradley S
Sam E

Commiserations to our Senior side who fell to a 3-2 loss in their District Cup Final. Congrats to @SJLPhysEd and thanks to @stalbanscityfc for hosting 💪🏻 

A close game well battled with two good sides. ⚽️ https://t.co/saPo51Ycm1

Senior District Cup Final - 
SJL vs @Verulam_PE https://t.co/ol0JwDln0j

Well done to the senior side who advance to their district cup final with a 3-1 against Roundwood.

They will play their final at Clarence Park after Easter 👊🏻💙

🎓 A unique and rare Education Player Programme which offers a full time A-Level & BTEC Education alongside receiving a professional football programme.

📝 3 weeks to sign up for our Trial showcase Game. 

🌐 Contact enquiry@stalbanscityfc.com to register.

#SACFCAcademy😇 https://t.co/hdESnkcttL
💪🏻💙 #FleetvilleSportxVerulamPE https://t.co/40f4l1WFBd

Great to see another primary outreach initiative underway, this time at St. Alban & St. Stephen Primary School. Our Year 12 senior prefects lending a helping hand at lunchtime, and expertly showing some hula hoops skills 💪🏻

#verulamforlife
#verulaminthecommunity https://t.co/bsa60UYH7s
What makes a Monday Morning?? How about the arrival to @verulamschool of the #VGNORWAY22 photo book!! @Verulam6thForm https://t.co/Z6lc1z69OH

Year 12 @verulamschool mathematicians receiving certificates for supporting KS3 students with their numeracy. Our year 7 and 8 students have loved getting to know our @Verulam6thForm mathematicians. Thank you and well done 👏 - looking forward to more of the same after Easter! https://t.co/P0B4ygjZq8

🗓 Re-arranged Education Player Programme Trials are next Saturday on the 26th February!

🌐 To trial and meet the coaches, please contact: enquiry@stalbanscityfc.com

#SACFCAcademy😇 https://t.co/P0XMpghfuw

🔔 5 days to go and counting for our Education Player Programme first trial! 

🏃 Make sure not to miss out and meet our coaches. 

🌐 Contact for more details: enquiry@stalbanscityfc.com

#SACFCAcademy😇 https://t.co/2nhyFVsCdn
Some @Verulam6thForm #VGNORWAY22 snapshots of creating #VerulamForLife memories. #CreativeForLife. https://t.co/LWBBzkdzpE
Lighthouse, geology lectures,and coffee by open fire, all in a #VGNORWAY days work for @verulamschool @Verulam6thForm #VG6thform. https://t.co/Ai2Fq8Q9L3
Super proud of my #VGNORWAY22 team. Half way through and loving every minute. @MrJPTeach @Phyllisavery02 @MikeToley @verulamGeogHoD https://t.co/cZAaHXA9nY

Day 3 #VSocSci Y13 @Verulam6thForm Trip to NYC. Art in Society, Social History & Culture. Fascinating ethnographic insights into 1850-1950 migrant NY at the Tenement Museum. Lunch at Grand Central Station. An afternoon in MoMa 😮‍💨 https://t.co/ura9dT0tFf
Day 2 #VSocSci Y13 @Verulam6thForm Trip to NYC. Poignancy, reflection and contemplation on our Global Migration and Global Terror Day 3/3 https://t.co/MeVvLvdMuj
